name.es: ScienceHelper - Descarga millones de ensayos académicos
name.ko: ScienceHelper — 수백만 건의 연구 논문 받기
name.ru: ScienceHelper - Доступ к миллионам научных работ

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With ScienceHelper, you can download millions of scientific articles
short.de: ScienceHelper gibt Zugriff auf wisschenschaftliche Artikel, Paper, und PDFs
short.es: ScienceHelper te ayuda a descargar ensayos académicos
short.ko: ScienceHelper 다는 논문 다운로드를 지원해 드립니다.
short.zh_CN: ScienceHelper 帮您下载研究论文

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ScienceHelper is a Chrome Extension for researchers and students. Use it to download papers and articles from thousands of websites. 
When you find an academic paper, simply click the ScienceHelper button in your toolbar to search the web for a legal Open Access version. ScienceHelper will automatically find the DOI of the paper you are looking at and use that information to find the paper from various online sources and databases.
long.de: ScienceHelper gibt Zugriff auf wisschenschaftliche Artikel, Paper, und PDFs
long.es: ScienceHelper te ayuda a descargar ensayos académicos
long.ko: ScienceHelper 다는 논문 다운로드를 지원해 드립니다
long.zh_CN: ScienceHelper 帮您下载研究论文
